attributes.additional_details: We want an inquest into the power given to members of the FA and want a review on foreign ownership on english football clubs. Example would be the current situation at Portsmouth Football Club. We would also like to petition for a fan elected board within the structure of the FA who would give the organisation an idea of what people actually want within the organisation. We would also like to ammend the current rates of pay for footballers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA.
